chart_description: The `k8s.cgroup.net_mtu` chart shows the network interface maximum transmission unit (MTU) of Kubernetes containers. The MTU is the largest packet size allowed on a link without fragmentation.

dimension_descriptions.mtu: The maximum transmission unit (MTU) dimension shows the network interface MTU size in octets of the Kubernetes container. The MTU size defines the maximum size of packets that can be transmitted over a network interface without fragmentation.
